1.text: Place your zoodles in a microwave-safe dish.

2.text: Pop the zoodles in your microwave.

4.text: Remove the bowl and test the noodles for crispness.

5.text: Toss the zoodles and heat them for another 30 seconds, if needed.

6.text: Cook them in 30 seconds increments until you get the consistency you want.

7.text: Plate the noodles and serve with your favorite sauce.

8.text: Bring a pot of water to a boil over high heat.

9.text: Add the zoodles to the pot and cook for 1 to 3 minutes.

10.text: Remove the zoodles from heat immediately.

11.text: Drain the zoodles thoroughly in a colander.

12.text: Divide the noodles onto serving plates and add your favorite sauce.

13.text: Heat 1 US tbsp (15 ml) of olive or avocado oil in a sauté pan.

14.text: Add the zoodles to the pan and sauté for 1 to 2 minutes.

15.text: Plate the zoodles and top with your favorite sauce.

17.text: Line a baking sheet with a dry paper towel.

18.text: Scatter the zoodles on the baking sheet and sprinkle with sea salt.

19.text: Bake the zoodles for 10 to 15 minutes.

20.text: Remove the zoodles from the oven and turn them out on a dry towel.

21.text: Divide the noodles and top with your favorite sauce.
